definition: of or relating to the marsupials, mammals of which the females have a pouch (the marsupium) containing the teats where the young are fed and carried
details:
adjective
- of or relating to the marsupials
= example: of or relating to the marsupials
noun
- mammals of which the females have a pouch (the marsupium) containing the teats where the young are fed and carried
= synonyms: pouched mammal
